responsibilities: Lead group of 4 engineers in design and creation of a new internal project monitoring web app used by over 300 users, and 1500+ project, across multiple game design studios.
Designed and implemented FastAPI routes to access third-party REST APIs and internal SQL and MongoDB databases.
Introduced GSA Central Database Interface standard to provide real-time updates from testing labs, enabling immediate notification of product approvals to stakeholders.
Introduced containerization to web applications and services, reducing downtimes to minutes instead of days and increasing reliability.
Refactored the internal Selenium wrapper and improved data replication scripts, increasing execution speed by 10 times and reducing replication time from hours to minutes introducing parallelization.
Created custom WSL distribution for Windows to facilitate development for users, reducing the time to set up a development environment from hours to minutes.
Created tools and scripts by my own initiative to facilitate the manual testing and generation of regulatory documentation.
Tested Unity games written in C# and kept a 100% regulatory approval rate.
